pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Doom 3 GPL source modification. Compared to the original DOOM 3, the changes of dhewm 3 worth mentioning are: * 64bit port * SDL for low level OS support, OpenGL and input handling * OpenAL for audio output, all OS specific audio backends are gone * OpenAL EFX for EAX reverb effects (read: EAX on all platforms) * A portable build system based on CMake * (Cross-)compilation with mingw-w64

use.flag: Adds support for the Resurrection of Evil expansion
